23. $y=\cfrac{\sqrt{(x+1)^2-4x}}{x^2-x}=\cfrac{\sqrt{(x-1)^2}}{x(x-1)}=\cfrac{|x-1|}{x(x-1)}=\begin{cases}\cfrac{1}{x},\ x>1,\\ -\cfrac{1}{x},\ x<1\end{cases}.$
$$$$% TIKZ_ID{9_klass_utf8-chapter006-023-solution-diag001.svg}
